### Please describe the feature you'd like to see added.



**Mempool, Policy, Validation**

- [x] #22290
- [ ] Avoid the risk of below-minrelaytxfee transactions hanging around forever in the mempool (currently only possible through reorgs and replacements after package CPFP). There are 3 options:
   - Don't ever allow v1 and v2 txs below minrelaytxfee (#26933)
   - Mine everything that makes it into in the mempool (default blockmintxfee to 0). Trim descendant packages <=0 fees, even when the mempool is not full (#27018)
   - Other long-term improvements that address this problem
- [ ] When loading mempool, keep transactions that are below minimum feerate(s) but are CPFP'd. (#26711)
- [ ] Properly assess incentive compatibility, submit transactions with their in-package ancestor sets (#26711)
- [ ] Handle any arbitrary package, even if unsorted (#26711)
- [ ] Relax from child-with-parents to tx-with-ancestors (#26711)
- (safe to expose on P2P)
- [ ] Add v3 rules that make transactions/packages easier to work with (#25038)
- [ ] Introduce a Miner Incentive Compatibility Score rule to RBF (#25038)
- [ ] Enable Package RBF for v3 transactions (#25038)
- [ ] Add Ephemeral Anchors rules for v3 transactions (#26403)

**P2P, Net Processing**
(Rough outline. Will fill in when PR is open.)
- [ ] BIP 331 (bitcoin/bips/pull/1382)
- [ ] Distinguish between tx failures that {can, cannot} be different in a package. Add a separate rejections cache.
- [ ] Enable more reliable usage of orphanage for ancestor package relay.
- [ ] Negotiate package relay support with peers, gated by config flag (`sendpackages`)
- [ ] Upon receiving an orphan, request a list of its ancestors (`ancpkginfo`) instead of parents by txid. Use that to download missing ancestors.
- [ ] Using package info, download (`getpkgtxns`) and submit packages together.
- [ ] Avoid telling legacy peers about transactions that need package relay to be accepted, to save bandwidth.
- [ ] Default the config flag to true.
